mapper.insert: insert into record (tableId, planId, sampleId, status, createAt, createBy, tableReportId) values(#{tableId}, #{planId}, #{sampleId}, #{status}, #{createAt}, #{createBy}, #{tableReportId})
mapper.update:
update record
modifyAt = #{modifyAt},
modifyBy = #{modifyBy},
firstApproveAt = #{firstApproveAt},
firstApproveBy = #{firstApproveBy},
finalApproveAt = #{finalApproveAt},
finalApproveBy = #{finalApproveBy},
finalApproveComment = #{finalApproveComment},
firstApproveComment = #{firstApproveComment},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.*, s.ssqx as areaCode, s.qymcCn as sampleName, p.round as planRound, t.name as tableName, g.id as groupId from record r, sample s, `table` t, reportplan p, tablegroup g where r.sampleId = s.id and r.planId = p.id and r.tableId = t.id and p.groupId = g.id and r.id = #{id}
select count(*) from record where id = #{id}
select id from record where tableId = #{tableId} and sampleId = #{sampleId} and planId = #{planId}
